      Assignment of a user to a group, when groupid exists creating user for this certain group if group doesn't exist error message and exception by failure
      protected void doGet(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Implemented GET method from javax.servlet.Servlet Not in use for this particular class
      protected void doPost(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      This method extracts the Parameters sent by register_student.jsp, checks several conditions and creates a new student user this method expects the groupid to be encoded ( first two digits: checksum; remaining digits: groupID*23) Safes parameters so they don't have to be reentered by failure Verifies if e-Mail and gender is entered, if password equals the password_repeat and changes role of user If the registration was successful the user is redirected to a landing page if not, the form is called again and an error/status message is displayed
      protected String resolveGroupid(String encryptedgroupid)
      This method resolves the groupID entered out of the encrypted groupid ( first two digits: checksum of remaining digits; remaining digits: groupID*23)
      protected void sendConfirmationMail(String email, String firstname, String lastname, String unverifiedEmail, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Sends an email with a link and text to confirm the e-Mail address is valid Failure exception is thrown

      • doPost

        protected void doPost(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
               throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                      IOException
        This method extracts the Parameters sent by register_student.jsp, checks several conditions and creates a new student user this method expects the groupid to be encoded ( first two digits: checksum; remaining digits: groupID*23) Safes parameters so they don't have to be reentered by failure Verifies if e-Mail and gender is entered, if password equals the password_repeat and changes role of user If the registration was successful the user is redirected to a landing page if not, the form is called again and an error/status message is displayed
        Overrides:
        doPost in class javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        Parameters:
        request - - contains the request of a client
        response - - contains the response of the servlet
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException - - throws exception when servlet encounters difficulties
        IOException - - signals that IO exception occured

      • createNewStudent

        protected String createNewStudent(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                  UserRealm realm,
                                  String email,
                                  String lastname,
                                  String firstname,
                                  String encryptedPassword,
                                  int gender)
        Assignment of a user to a group, when groupid exists creating user for this certain group if group doesn't exist error message and exception by failure
        Parameters:
        request - - contains the request of the client
        realm - - UserRealm object (was created after the parameters where send by user)
        email - - contains the e-Mail of the new user
        lastname - - contains the lastname of the new user
        firstname - - contains the firstname of the new user
        encryptedPassword - - contains the encrypted password of the new user
        gender - - contains the gender of the new user
        Returns:
        url - Registration URL

                                    UserRealm realm,

                                    String encryptedPassword,
                                    int gender)
        Creates a new user with the parameter professor with admin rights and deletes attributes email, firstname, lastname
        Parameters:
        request - - contains the request of the user
        realm - - - UserRealm object (was created after the parameters where send by user)
        email - - contains the e-Mail of the new user
        lastname - - contains the lastname of the new user
        firstname - - contains the firstname of the new user
        encryptedPassword - - contains the encrypted password of the new user
        gender - - contains the gender of the new user
        Returns:
        url - URL Admin site

      • sendConfirmationMail

        protected void sendConfirmationMail(String email,
                                    String firstname,
                                    String lastname,
                                    String unverifiedEmail,
                                    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Sends an email with a link and text to confirm the e-Mail address is valid Failure exception is thrown
        Parameters:
        email - - contains the e-Mail of the user, where confirmation mail is send to
        firstname - - contains the first name of the new user
        lastname - - contains the last name of the new user
        unverifiedEmail - - contains the e-Mail address of the new user that needs confirmation
        request - - contains the request of the user (send user information)

      • resolveGroupid

        protected String resolveGroupid(String encryptedgroupid)
        This method resolves the groupID entered out of the encrypted groupid ( first two digits: checksum of remaining digits; remaining digits: groupID*23)
        Parameters:
        encryptedgroupid - - contains the encrypted groupid of a certain user
        Returns:
        resolved - resolved groupid
